`, ``, ``, ``, ``, ``, ``, ``, and more) are opened but not properly closed with a corresponding closing tag. 2. For example, the opening tag for `` is followed immediately by the opening tag for `` without the closing tag for `` appearing first. The same pattern repeats throughout the document. The answer to whether there is any structural error in this XML is `True`, and the errors include unclosed tags and improper nesting of elements.
